title: Senior MLOps Engineer
summary: Highly accomplished Senior MLOps Engineer with over 7 years of experience designing, building, and deploying scalable machine learning systems in production. Expertise in orchestrating ML pipelines, implementing robust CI/CD for models, and managing cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP). Proven track record of enhancing model reliability, performance, and operational efficiency for high-impact data science initiatives.

cloud: GCP (Cloud AI Platform, GKE, Cloud Functions)

description: Led the design and implementation of MLOps pipelines for critical machine learning models, reducing model deployment time by 40% and improving reliability.
Architected and managed Kubernetes clusters (EKS, GKE) for scalable model serving and training workloads, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
Developed custom monitoring and alerting solutions using Prometheus and Grafana for ML model performance and infrastructure health.
Implemented robust CI/CD strategies for ML code, data, and models, integrating with Jenkins and GitOps workflows.
Collaborated with data scientists and engineers to productionize models, focusing on scalability, reproducibility, and compliance.
Built and maintained automated data pipelines for ML model training and evaluation using Airflow and Spark.
Containerized ML applications using Docker and deployed them to AWS ECS, optimizing resource utilization by 25%.
Implemented version control for datasets and models using DVC and Git, ensuring reproducibility of experiments.
Developed RESTful APIs for model inference using FastAPI and deployed them with automated scaling.
Assisted in the migration of on-premise ML workloads to AWS SageMaker, improving scalability and reducing operational overhead.
Developed and maintained ETL processes for various data sources using Python and SQL.
Managed and optimized relational databases (PostgreSQL) for data warehousing and analytics.
Assisted in building data quality checks and monitoring frameworks.
Collaborated with data scientists to prepare and clean data for machine learning projects.

certifications.name: Google Cloud Professional Machine Learning Engineer
